attributes.action: Take down the petition asking to remove abortions from the NHS
attributes.background:
It's a daft petition. I do not feel taking away women's rights to an abortion is a good use of this website.

The petition in question is here:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/178191

rejection.details:
We can only remove petitions that don't comply with the petitions standards.

You could start a new petition calling for a specific change to the rules for petitions. You can find out about the rules here:

https://petition.parliament.uk/help
